content.question: Of the following, which was the central issue for nineteenth-century European advocates of women's rights?

choices.label: The right of women to control their own property
The right to serve in the military
Alimony and child support in cases of divorce
The right to civil marriage ceremonies

content.answer: The right of women to control their own property

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
